faqs.question: What Shape Key tools are available?
faqs.answer:
[image]https://i.imgur.com/wAaXsqF.png[/image]

### Features:
- Remove Shape Keys: Removes unused shape keys
- Repair Shape Keys: Fixes broken shape keys
- Optimize Shape Keys: Improves GPU performance
- Apply Shape Key as Basis: Creates new basis from selected shape key

[image]https://i.imgur.com/zEnr1KA.png[/image]
